events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message about receiving the wrong item.
Agent Samantha has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer who received the wrong product.
Hello, this is Samantha from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and I am here to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
The order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that was delivered to me.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method immediately and send you a prepaid return label.
Thanks for resolving this quickly. I appreciate the prompt refund and the return label for the incorrect product.
The refund has been processed, and return instructions sent. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Checking in to confirm you have received your refund and that the return process went smoothly.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
